description.raw:
I get linker errors when building `subt_example`. 

    CMakeFiles/subt_example_node.dir/src/subt_example_node.cc.o: In function `main':
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::g_initialized'
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::initialize()'
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::initializeLogLocation(ros::console::LogLocation*, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&, ros::console::levels::Level)'
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::setLogLocationLevel(ros::console::LogLocation*, ros::console::levels::Level)'
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::checkLogLocationEnabled(ros::console::LogLocation*)'
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::print(ros::console::FilterBase*, void*, ros::console::levels::Level, char const*, int, char const*, char const*, ...)'
    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
    make[2]: *** [devel/lib/subt_example/subt_example_node] Error 1
    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/subt_example_node.dir/all] Error 2
    make: *** [all] Error 2

‌
description.html:
I get linker errors when building subt_example. 

CMakeFiles/subt_example_node.dir/src/subt_example_node.cc.o: In function `main':
/home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::g_initialized'
/home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::initialize()'
/home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::initializeLogLocation(ros::console::LogLocation*, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&, ros::console::levels::Level)'
/home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::setLogLocationLevel(ros::console::LogLocation*, ros::console::levels::Level)'
/home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::checkLogLocationEnabled(ros::console::LogLocation*)'
/home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::print(ros::console::FilterBase*, void*, ros::console::levels::Level, char const*, int, char const*, char const*, ...)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

make: *** [all] Error 2

title: Link against roscpp in subt_example

summary.raw:
I get linker errors when building `subt_example`. 

    CMakeFiles/subt_example_node.dir/src/subt_example_node.cc.o: In function `main':
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::g_initialized'
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::initialize()'
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::initializeLogLocation(ros::console::LogLocation*, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&, ros::console::levels::Level)'
    /home/developer/workspaces/subt/src/subt/subt_example/src/subt_example_node.cc:33: undefined reference to `ros::console::setLogLocationLevel(ros::console::LogLocation*, ros::console::levels::Level)'
